topic.title: Are There Any Indian Friends?  Any News about the Withdrawing of Troops from the China-India Boundary?
topic.body: The Chinese government cheats us that India withdrew its troop from the boundary under the great pressure from China.  There is also news that, in fact, the Chinese government sends a great amount of money to India.  What are Indian media saying?

1_12BA8CeJuG7FZYs7EpGg2rTs3pxkdRNZrV.body: Google, facebook, twitter, youtube, ..., or even part of Wikipedia (such as zh.wikipedia.org), are all blocked by the Great Firewall out of mainland China.  A post in China can be deleted if the government does not like it, or if the site manager thinks the government does not like it.  Of course, not all posts like this are deleted, but most of them are.  Someone even is thrown into jail because of his "bad posts".  Thus ZeroNet and twister are welcome in mainland China.

1_1J8KfBHzSdearMNoQo91UGQGShXU9AAnFz.body: 江大核心给老百姓唱过《我的太阳》吗？一个意思。

> [credit](#comment_3_1FmYoFUbNXqpJ4v42ZGfVRKNaodu25YK8B): 江大核心给老百姓唱过《我的太阳》吗？一个意思。

屁民不再有资格听皇后娘娘唱歌。

1_19bxeaAV3CdRCr8BegmEXTqwhV15EabmS2.body: Only when it is tested and works in China, was it a good P2P file sharing system.
It should be P2P and anonymous.
